snippet: Yum Brands named the head of its Taco Bell chain to be its next chief executive, marking a major promotion for the man responsible for the popular Doritos Locos Tacos.
abstract: Yum Brands names Greg Creed, head of its Taco Bell chain, to become its next chief executive; marks major promotion for man responsible for popular Doritos Locos Tacos.
lead_paragraph: Yum Brands named the head of its Taco Bell chain to be its next chief executive, marking a major promotion for the man responsible for the popular Doritos Locos Tacos.

headline.main: Next Chief of Yum Brands Comes From Taco Bell Chain
headline.print_headline: Next Chief of Yum Brands Comes From Taco Bell Chain
